description:
It’s hard to imagine Starfleet without its Enterprises, and there would have been no Enterprises without the Enterprise NX-01, the first of its kind. She is the long-awaited child of technology and ambition, made possible thanks to the tireless research of Dr. Henry Archer and Dr. Zefram Cochrane, who spent decades perfecting the warp drive, making distant stars reachable in weeks and even days. The pinnacle of human civilization of its time, NX-01 was tasked with an almost impossible mission: explore the galaxy and prove that people have a well-deserved place in it. 

Starfleet’s mission of finding strange new worlds proved perilous from the start. Since its maiden voyage, NX-01 repeatedly found itself in the midst of the most intense conflicts, dicey adventures, insidious plans, and unprecedented dangers, be it a perspective of full-scale Klingon Civil War, or the deadly Temporal Cold War. But no matter which challenges NX-01 faced, it had Captain Archer and his crew at the helm. Their ingenuity and bravery built the Enterprise legacy that now spans centuries and precedes not only the ship itself but also Starfleet and the United Federation of Planets.

ship_ability.title: Learning The Hard Way
ship_ability.description:
The Enterprise NX-01 increases its base damage by +{value} against Xindi-Aquatic hostiles

Polarized hull
The Enterprise NX-01 deflects 9 shots from each of the Xindi-Aquatic weapons
